data.title: Photos of 2 suspects in Boston Bombing released
28 migrant workers working at a strawberry farm in Manolada, Greece have been shot because they demanded to get paid, after six months of unpaid work
Fertilizer plant just exploded near Waco Texas.

Pope Francis redirects employee bonuses to charity. "Vatican employees won’t receive the special bonus they are traditionally awarded when a new pope is elected, the Vatican confirmed on Thursday (April 18), under orders from Pope Francis to give extra money to charity instead."
Afghan women commit suicide to escape marriage: "The suicide rate is rising particularly in towns because women are fighting against forced marriages there."
NASA: 3 new planets could host life

One of Australia's most exclusive universities has called off a talk to students by the Dalai Lama, prompting accusations it is bowing to China which has branded the exiled Tibetan spiritual leader a dangerous separatist.
Blast in popular Baghdad coffee shop kills at least 27
Bush-era torture use 'indisputable,' Guantanamo must close, task force finds
A man diagnosed with late stage cancer saves the life of his ambulance driver when the latter had a heart attack while driving the former to a hospital
